attributes.action: The Peoples Fight Against Parliament - Keep No Deal Brexit on the Table
attributes.additional_details: This is the Peoples Fight Against Parliament to keep No Deal Brexit on the table.. A bargaining power the UK needs so we can leave with a decent deal or No deal as Boris Johnson has promised..
attributes.background: THE PEOPLES FIGHT AGAINST PARLIAMENT!!!  TO KEEP A NO DEAL BREXIT ON THE TABLE SO WE HAVE A CHOICE WHEN WE LEAVE ON THE 31ST OCTOBER... GOOD DEAL OR NO DEAL!!!
